sentences.sentence: Her parents asked her don't look down on chuff.
sentences.translation: 她父母叫她不要瞧不起乡下人。

sentences.sentence: When I was in trouble, he would chuff me up and help me.
sentences.translation: 当我遇到麻烦时，他就会鼓励并帮助我。

sentences.sentence: A flotilla of low craft chuff from left to right, man and wife hunched at the stern.
sentences.translation: 一小队乡下船队从左开到右，男人和他们的妻子举着枪。
